Package app.state

Class EditPlaylistState

  • java.lang.Object
    • app.state.EditPlaylistState
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    State
    public class EditPlaylistState
extends java.lang.Object
implements State
    The EditPlaylistState class allows users to add or remove songs from a specified playlist. It also provides options to play the playlist or navigate back to the previous menu.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      void display()
      Displays the available songs, the selected playlist's contents, and the command options for adding or removing songs from the playlist.
      void handleAddToPlaylist​(java.lang.String indexPart)
      Adds a song to the playlist based on the specified index.
      void handleInput​(java.lang.String input)
      Processes user input for editing the playlist by adding or removing songs, or navigating between menus.
      void handleRemoveToPlaylist​(java.lang.String indexPart)
      Removes a song from the playlist based on the specified index.
